item.title: ReaderFlow - Privacy Policy
item.description: Privacy Policy This privacy policy applies to the ReaderFlow app (hereby referred to as “Application”) for mobile devices that was created by Marco Gomiero (hereby referred to as “Service Provider”) as a Free service. This service is intended for use “AS IS”. What information does the Application obtain and how is it used? The Application does not obtain any information when you download and use it. Registration is not required to use the Application.

item.title: FeedFlow - Privacy Policy
item.description: Marco Gomiero built the FeedFlow app as a Free app. This SERVICE is provided by Marco Gomiero at no cost and is intended for use as is. This page is used to inform visitors regarding my policies with the collection, use, and disclosure of Personal Information if anyone decided to use my Service. If you choose to use my Service, then you agree to the collection and use of information in relation to this policy.
